::Koj::
"Thats nice but ?1 you have to go back!" Looking at ?1

::?1::
"Look I took a leave from fighting to get away from this war." Walks into a 
great hallway.

::Koj::
"What happened to the friend that believed in himself and believed in his 
dreams!"

::?1::
Stops in mid step thinks back to when he said that. "There just words 
nothing more than pretty words."

::Koj::
"He lost faith in his own ability."

::?1::
?1 Refects on what Koj said "Have I lost faith?"
